channel.title: How can I put my skills to use?
channel.description:
I'm on my last school year, I haven't graduated yet.
I know the fundamentals of Python and C/C++, Linux basics, Linux server management beginner knowledge, cybersecurity basics. I used to make basic tools which I would then sell to script kiddies, but I don't have the option to do it anymore.
I don't think I can find a job yet because I don't have any experience and nor have I graduated.
What are the things I can do to put the little experience I have to use?

item.title: How can I put my skills to use?
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I put my skills to use?
